name: Broken Engine Sandbox
description:
Tech demo for the C++20 Vulkan game engine "Broken Engine" by Broken Teapot Studios.

Will write saves and replays to: %APPDATA%\Broken Engine Sandbox

If you run into any problems (crashes, bugs, or performance issues), please e-mail me: brokenteapotstudios@gmail.com

  • Move - W/A/S/D
  • Spawn objects - Left mouse
  • Delete objects - Right mouse
  • Reset world - Enter
  • Toggle full screen - F1
  • Toggle presentation mode - F2
  • Toggle anti-aliasing - F3
  • Save snapshot - F5
  • Load snapshot - F6
  • Begin/end saving a replay - F7
  • Load replay - F8
  • Pause - Spacebar
  • Slow down time - -
  • Speed up time - =
  • Adjust camera angle - Up/Down
  • Zoom in/out camera - Q/E
